languages.text: Старшие офицеры всех палуб подали общий рапорт мое{mf|му|й} благословенно{mf|му|й} Лорд-капитану. Согласно отчетам всех служб корабля, шансы благополучного исхода прыжка к Порту Странник равны нулю. От лица всего экипажа они сообщили, что служить под командованием наше{mf|го|й} славно{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ьницы} было честью для них и, если такова е{mf|го|е} воля, они готовы идти вперед и встретить смерть. Слава династии Валанциус и его отважным слугам!

traits.locale_text: Старшие офицеры всех палуб подали общий рапорт мое{mf|му|й} благословенно{mf|му|й} Лорду-Капитану. Согласно отчетам всех служб корабля, шансы благополучного исхода прыжка к Порту Странник равны нулю. От лица всего экипажа они сообщили, что служить под командованием наше{mf|го|й} славно{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ьницы} было честью для них и, если такова е{mf|го|е} воля, они готовы идти вперед и встретить смерть. Слава дому Валанциус и его отважным слугам!

languages.text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!
languages.original_text: Старшие офицеры всех палуб подали общий рапорт мое{mf|му|й} благословенно{mf|му|й} Лорд-капитану. Согласно отчетам всех служб корабля, шансы благополучного исхода прыжка к Порту Странник равны нулю. От лица всего экипажа они сообщили, что служить под командованием наше{mf|го|й} славно{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ьницы} было честью для них и, если такова е{mf|го|е} воля, они готовы идти вперед и встретить смерть. Слава династии Валанциус и его отважным слугам!

traits.locale_text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favorable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honor, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to the house of Valancius and its valiant servants!

The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!

languages.text: Los oficiales superiores de cada cubierta presentaron un informe general a{mf|l| la} bendit{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán. La evaluación de todos y cada uno de los servicios de la nave es la misma: las probabilidades de que el salto a Puerto Vagabundo tenga éxito son cero. En nombre de la tripulación, han declarado que servir a las órdenes de nuestr{mf|o|a} comandante ha sido un honor y que, si esa es su voluntad, están listos para avanzar hasta la muerte. ¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius y sus valientes sirvientes!
languages.original_text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales superiores de cada cubierta presentaron un informe general a{mf|l| la} bendit{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. La evaluación de todos y cada uno de los servicios de la nave es la misma: las probabilidades de que el salto a Puerto Vagabundo tenga éxito son cero. En nombre de la tripulación, han declarado que servir a las órdenes de nuestr{mf|o|a} comandante ha sido un honor y que, si esa es su voluntad, están listos para avanzar hasta la muerte. ¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius y sus valientes sirvientes!

languages.text: 甲板上所有的高级军官都向受祝福的领主舰长进行了报告。根据舰船上所有部门的评估，如果想要通过亚空间跳跃至漫游港，顺利抵达的几率为零。他们代表全体船员，宣称在光荣的指挥官手下工作是一种荣耀。而且，如果继续前进就是{mf|他|她}的意愿，那所有人都愿意继续前进，直面死亡。荣耀归于瓦兰修斯家族与它英勇的仆人们！
languages.original_text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!

traits.locale_text: 甲板上所有的高级军官都向受祝福的领主舰长进行了报告。根据舰船上所有部门的评估，如果想要通过亚空间跳跃至漫游港，顺利抵达的几率为零。他们代表全体船员，宣称在光荣的指挥官手下工作是一种荣耀。而且，如果继续前进就是{mf|他|她}的意愿，那所有人都愿意继续前进，直面死亡。荣耀归于瓦兰修斯家族与它英勇的仆人们！

languages.text: すべてのデッキの上級士官が、我らが祝福されしロード・キャプテンに総括報告をした。船のあらゆる部門の見積もりでは、ポート・ワンダーへのジャンプがこちらの都合の良い結果になる可能性はゼロだった。彼らは全クルーを代表して、我らが栄光ある司令のもとで働けたことは名誉であり、あなたの意志であれば、このまま進んで死を迎える覚悟はできていると宣言した。フォン・ヴァランシウス家とその勇敢な家臣たちに栄光あれ！
languages.original_text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!

traits.locale_text: すべてのデッキの上級士官が、我らが祝福されしロード・キャプテンに総括報告をした。船のあらゆる部門の見積もりでは、ポート・ワンダーへのジャンプがこちらの都合の良い結果になる可能性はゼロだった。彼らは全クルーを代表して、我らが栄光ある司令のもとで働けたことは名誉であり、あなたの意志であれば、このまま進んで死を迎える覚悟はできていると宣言した。フォン・ヴァランシウス家とその勇敢な家臣たちに栄光あれ！

languages.text: Die leitenden Offiziere aller Decks erstatteten meinem gesegneten Herrn Kapitän einen allgemeinen Bericht. Nach den Einschätzungen aller Dienststellen des Schiffes waren die Chancen für einen günstigen Ausgang eines Sprungs nach Port Wander gleich Null. Im Namen der gesamten Besatzung erklärten sie, dass es eine Ehre gewesen sei, unter unserem glorreichen Kommandanten zu dienen, und dass sie, wenn es sein Wille sei, bereit seien, vorwärts zu gehen und in den Tod zu gehen. Ruhm dem Haus von Valancius und seinen tapferen Dienern!
languages.original_text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!

languages.text: Les officiers supérieurs de tous les ponts ont fait leur rapport {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|loué soit-il|louée soit-elle}. D'après les évaluations de l'ensemble des services du vaisseau, les chances de réussite d'un saut vers Port l'Errance étaient nulles. Au nom de tout l'équipage, ils ont déclaré que servir sous les ordres de notre {mf|glorieux commandant|glorieuse commandante} avait été un honneur et que, si telle était sa volonté, ils étaient prêts à mourir en poursuivant la traversée. Gloire à la maison von Valancius et à ses valeureux serviteurs !
languages.original_text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!

traits.locale_text: Les officiers supérieurs de tous les ponts ont fait leur rapport {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|loué soit-il|louée soit-elle}. D'après les évaluations de l'ensemble des services du vaisseau, les chances d'une issue favorable à un saut vers Port l'Errance étaient nulles. Au nom de tout l'équipage, ils ont déclaré que servir sous les ordres de notre {mf|glorieux commandant|glorieuse commandante} avait été un honneur et que, si telle était sa volonté, ils étaient prêts à mourir en poursuivant la traversée. Gloire à la maison Valancius et à ses valeureux serviteurs !

languages.text: Tüm güvertelerden gelen kıdemli subaylar, kutsanmış Lord Kaptanıma genel bir rapor verdiler. Geminin hizmet birimlerinin değerlendirmeleri ışığında Irak Liman'a başarılı bir sıçrama yapma ihtimali sıfırdı. Tüm mürettebat adına haşmetli kumandanımıza hizmet etmenin büyük şeref olduğunu söylediler ve eğer dileği buysa ileri atılıp ölüme yürümeye hazır olduklarını ilettiler. Von Valancius Hanesi'ne ve onun yiğit hizmetkârlarına selam olsun!
languages.original_text: The senior officers from all decks gave a general report to my blessed Lord Captain. According to the assessments of all the ship's services, the chances of a favourable outcome of a jump to Port Wander were zero. On behalf of the entire crew, they declared that serving under our glorious commander had been an honour, and, if it was {mf|his|her} will, they were ready to forge onward and meet their deaths. Glory to House von Valancius and its valiant servants!

traits.locale_text: Tüm güvertelerden gelen kıdemli subaylar, kutsanmış Lord Kaptan'ıma genel raporlarını verdi. Geminin sistemlerinin değerlendirmeleri ışığında Irak Liman'a başarılı bir sıçrama yapma ihtimali sıfırdı. Tüm mürettebat adına haşmetli kumandanımıza hizmet etmenin büyük bir onur olduğunu söylediler ve eğer dileği buysa ileri atılıp ölümlerini kucaklamaya hazır olduklarını ilettiler. Von Valancius Hanesi'ne ve onun yiğit hizmetkârlarına selam olsun!
